revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=LinkStation |revision=Pro (LS-250GL) v1 |manuf_country=Japan |is_manuf=No |type=NAS |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.3 |pwr_conn=C7 |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F5182 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=256 KiB |fla1_brand=SST |fla1_model=39VF020 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Elpida |ram1_model=E5116AF-5C-E |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA, |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 10-pin header,, unpopulated |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1111 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=I2C Bus Serial RTC;Ricoh;RS5C372A;;1;,,, 16-bit D-Type Latch;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC16373A;;2;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-AND Gate;SN54LVC08A;;1;,,, 30V, 7A Power Switching DC/DC Converter;Rohm Semiconductor;SP8K3;;1;,,, 4A Low Dropout Regulator;Global Mixed-mode Technology;G973;;2;,,, 3A Peak Current Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;MVPG31;;1;,,, Field Programmable DSP Switcher;Marvell;88PG847B;;1;,,, |flags=RTC w/ battery backup, fan, |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.1;Marvell 1.12.1 TINY |stock_os=Linux;2.6.16.16;;, |tp_firmware=Foonas, FreeLink, Debian, |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui_eth=00:16:01 }} '''Buffalo LinkStation Pro''' :[http://www.buffalotech.com/products/network-storage/linkstation/linkstation-pro Product Page]
*[http://buffalo.nas-central.org/wiki/Category:LSPro NAS Central Wiki]
Available with one of the following Disk sizes 160GB, 250GB 320GB, 400GB, 500GB, 750GB, 1TB.
*[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/28111-buffalolinkstationproreview ''Buffalo LinkStation Pro (LS-250GL)'' review on '''SmallNetBuilder''']
*[http://miniconf.debian.or.jp/assets/files/Debian%20Installer%20for%20Buffalo%20Linkstation%20NAS.pdf Debian Installer for Buffalo Linkstation]
